name: custom-element-showcase
description: An example that use that demonstrates the custom elements from @dojo/widgets and themes from @dojo/themes

scripts.build: shx rm -rf _build && tsc && shx cp src/index.html _build && shx cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/custom-elements _build && shx cp -r node_modules/@dojo/widgets/dist _build/widgets && shx cp -r node_modules/@dojo/themes/dist _build/themes
